# thetalake_integration_state (Resource)

Theta Lake Integration State Resource. Manages the paused/active state of an integration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thetalake_integration_state" "example" {
  integration_id = "123"
  paused         = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `integration_id` (String) The ID of the integration to manage.
- `paused` (Boolean) Whether the integration is paused.

### Read-Only

- `last_run` (String) Timestamp of the last run.
- `last_upload` (String) Timestamp of the last upload.
